title: Emacs go-mode works wrong for names with underscoring
body:
by **iakov.davydov**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Open .go file in emacs with go-mode
2. Write something like a := test_fun() in the main function

What is the expected output?
test_fun will be highlighted

What do you see instead?
only "fun" is highlighted

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOARCH=amd64 
GOOS=linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
e65a9a24dc4b (but go-mode was not changed since Oct 22 2009)
